node.context:
<!--Nodelet Break -->
[%
  # Code cleansed by Petruchio Tuesay March 26th 2002
  
  my $title = $NODELET->{title};
  my $ntc   = $THEME->{nodeletTitleColor}    || '#CC99FF';
  my $ntfa  = $THEME->{nodeletTitleFontAttr} || '#FFFFFF';
  my $id    = $title;
  $ntfa =~ s/.*=//;
  $id   =~ s/ /_/g;

<<END;
    <tbody class = "nodelet" id = "$id">
      <tr class = "nodelet_head">
        <th style = "background-color: $ntc; font-weight: bold; color: $ntfa">
          $title
        </th>
      </tr>
CONTAINED_STUFF
    </tbody>
END
%]
node.title: sparse nodelet container
